mapper.select:
SELECT p.uniqueid product_id, f.id family_id, f.productId family_productId, m.id manufacturer_id, m.name manufacturer_name, fi.id finish_id, fi.finish finish_description, sd.freeShipping isFreeShipping, pbc.cost defaultPriceBookCost FROM tempData.dbo.ProductPreferredVendorQuickShip ppv INNER JOIN mmc.product.product p ON p.uniqueId = ppv.productUniqueId INNER JOIN mmc.product.shippingDetail sd
ON sd.uniqueId = p.uniqueId AND (sd.LTL IS NULL OR sd.LTL = 0) INNER JOIN mmc.product.family f ON f.id = p.familyId INNER JOIN mmc.product.finish fi ON fi.id = p.finishId INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.Manufacturer m ON m.ID = f.manufacturerId INNER JOIN mmc.dbo.PriceBook_Cost pbc ON p.uniqueId = pbc.uniqueId AND pbc.priceBookId = 1 LEFT JOIN omc.dbo.orderShippedDateComparison osdc ON ppv.productuniqueid = osdc.uniqueId AND osdc.shippingEstimateMethodId = 6 WHERE
p.statusId = ${@com.ferguson.cs.vendor.quickship.model.product.ProductStatus@STOCK.getIntValue()} AND
( osdc.inStockDaysLow is null OR osdc.instockdaysLow = 0 )
AND ppv.VendorUID IN
#{id}
ORDER BY p.uniqueid ASC OFFSET #{criteria.offset} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{criteria.pageSize} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE mmc.product.modified SET modifiedBy=SUSER_SNAME(), modifiedDate = getDate() WHERE uniqueId = #{id}
INSERT tempData.dbo.ProductPreferredVendorQuickShip(productUniqueId, vendorUId) SELECT productUniqueId, vendorUId FROM MMC.dbo.ProductPreferredVendor;
